sec.title: Funding
sec.p: This research received no specific grant from any funding agency in the public, commercial, or not-for-profit sector.

sec.title: Availability of data and materials
sec.p: The datasets generated and/or analyzed during the current study are available in the Research Electronic Data Capture (REDCap) system repository, which is hosted on the Web server of the University of SÃ£o Paulo.
